stories.title: LLM Chat Interface & Prompt System
stories.description: As a Seeker, I want to chat with the AI to refine my intent. Tech Note: Requires a structured prompt system and STREAMING response handling.
acceptance_criteria: UI displays specific suggestion bubbles (Quick Chips).
System implements a 'Reasoning Chain' to ask clarifying questions.
LLM responses stream token-by-token to UI (Time to First Token < 1.5s).
Typing indicators must be 'mystical'.

stories.title: Virtual Deck State Engine (Logic Only)
stories.description: As a developer, I want a deterministic data structure for the deck so that the simulation is preserved across app restarts.
acceptance_criteria: Array of 78 card objects initialized with unique IDs.
Fisher-Yates shuffle algorithm implementation.
State persistence (Redux/Context + AsyncStorage) to save deck order.

stories.title: Interactive Deck Renderer & Transitions
stories.description: As a user, I want smooth 60fps animations and a fluid transition from Chat to Table.
acceptance_criteria: Seamless morph/fade transition from Chat View to Deck View (no loading spinners).
React Native Reanimated implementation for card movements.
Complex Haptic feedback profile (Tick = Shuffle, Heavy Thud = Drop).

stories.title: Design System & Thematic Engine
stories.description: As a UI Designer, I need a centralized system that supports 'Thematic Progression' (shifting colors based on session phase).
acceptance_criteria: Define Typography and Color Palette.
Implement 'ThemeContext' that interpolates colors (Light -> Dark -> Gold) based on state.
Export high-res card assets.

stories.title: Hybrid Authentication Flow
stories.description: As a new user, I want to try a reading without signing up immediately.
acceptance_criteria: Allow 'Guest' session start.
Prompt for Sign-up/OAuth only after reading is complete (to save history).
Merge Guest data into new account upon creation.

stories.title: [SPIKE] Animation Performance Prototype
stories.description: Evaluate React Native Skia vs. Reanimated for handling 78 concurrent card sprites.
acceptance_criteria: Prototype created with 78 moving elements.
Benchmark report for iOS and Android.

stories.title: Local Data Privacy & Obfuscation
stories.description: As a skeptical user, I want my personal queries to be stored securely.
acceptance_criteria: User chat history stored encrypted in local storage.
API calls to LLM do not send persistent user ID unless necessary.
Clear 'Delete History' button functional.

stories.title: Card Reveal & Interpretation
stories.description: As a user, I want to flip cards to see their meaning and get a synthesized final answer.
acceptance_criteria: Tap to flip individual cards with 3D rotation.
Card Reveal triggers 'Magical' particle effect.
LLM generates 'Macro' synthesis linking all cards to query.
